snippet: A recent spate of killings and intimidation aimed at gay Iraqis and teenagers dressed in brash Western fashions is sending waves of fear through Iraq’s secular circles.
abstract: Spate of killings and intimidation aimed at gay Iraqis and teenagers dressed in brash Western fashions is sending waves of fear through Iraq’s secular circles while casting doubt on the government's will to protect some of its most vulnerable citizens.

byline.contributor: Duraid Adnan, Zaid Thaker and Omar al-Jawoshy contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A recent spate of killings and intimidation aimed at gay Iraqis and teenagers dressed in brash Western fashions is sending waves of fear through Iraq’s secular circles.

headline.seo: Killings Alarm Young Iraqis, Including Gays
headline.main: Threats and Killings Striking Fear Among Young Iraqis, Including Gays
headline.print_headline: Threats and Killings Striking Fear Among Young Iraqis, Including Gays
